summary: SharedAddControlButton was updated to gate opening the Add Control modal on (mode===edit && isInitialized && !isLoading), show a loading spinner during layout loading, and provide disabled-state tooltips via a wrapper element so the tooltip can trigger even when the underlying button is disabled. However, the diff summary does not provide evidence that both the header Add Control button and the Import/Export Versions-tab button are actually using this shared component/implementation as required.

missing_requirements.requirement: Header and Versions-tab “Add Control” buttons both use the shared implementation and behave identically.
missing_requirements.reason: Only SharedAddControlButton.tsx changes are shown. The diff summary does not include the header button implementation or confirm that both the header and Versions tab are wired to use SharedAddControlButton (or that both were updated/reverted together).
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions ImportExportPanel uses shared button, but no actual diff for header/ImportExportPanel wiring)
